amendment.description: To provide for the temporary inapplicability of the Berry Amendment to procurements of speciality metals that are used to produce force protection equipment needed to prevent combat fatalities in Iraq and Afghanistan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2525 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
